page.title: 05Looking after the sick.
page.content:
The{Health Centre}is at the bottom of School Road.It is about 7 years old. {There are 2 doctors,a district nurse {a Health Visitor and 4 dispensers and {receptionists.}The doctors see their patients in consulting rooms or, if they are very ill, at home. There are no chemist shops in the village so the doctors make up the medicines. The nurse and Health Visitor look after old and young. They often call at the home.There is a small hospital in Liskeard but{very ill people go to {Plymouth.}This makes it difficult for friends to visit them. There is no maternity hospital in East Cornwall so mothers have to go to Plymouth, Tavistock or Truro.
{ Stephanie Jane Carew. { Maria Lisa Kerslake.
